title: 命令全部调用失败
author: 小金啊
txt_content: /execute @a[tag=战士,score_决斗阵营=0,score_决斗阵营_min=0] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @r[score_决斗阵营=1,score_决斗阵营_min=1,r=10] add 目标 这个指令执行不成功，一直调用失败

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
execute @a[tag=战士,score_决斗阵营=0,score_决斗阵营_min=0] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @r[score_决斗阵营=1,score_决斗阵营_min=1,r=10] add 目标
这个，是绝对不行的，不支持中文，乖乖用英文和数字
比如execute @a[tag=zs,score_jdzy=0,score_jdzy_min=0] ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @r[score_jdzy=1,score_jdzy_min=1,r=10] add mubiao
